pfm¶

platform

Unix, Windows

synopsis

Parse PFR PFM, display and customize PFM.

PFM module is used to check PFM rules for verification and also for PFM customization

Classes

PFM(image_bdata[, logfile])

PFM class for PFM decode analysis of PFM image file or binary data
class pfm.ConfigDict¶

Bases: collections.OrderedDict

define an ordered dictionary

class pfm.PFM(image_bdata, logfile=None)¶

Bases: object

PFM class for PFM decode analysis of PFM image file or binary data

Parameters

  • image_bdata – unsigned pfm image file or data bytes

  • logfile – logfile, optional, default is None, only display in screen.

show(fmt='orgtbl')¶

display PFM data structure

show_fvm(fmt='orgtbl')¶

display FVM in the pfr image

show_pfm_head(fmt='orgtbl')¶

display PFM head

show_smb(fmt='orgtbl')¶

display SMBus rules

show_spi(fmt='orgtbl')¶

show spi region

pfm.main(args)¶

verify PFR image or stgaing capsure
